sentences.sContent: She had information that she couldn’t wait to impart.
sentences.sCn: 她得到了消息，迫不及待地想告诉别人。

sentences.sContent: ...and its efforts to conquer the gender gap impart a vital lesson-though not the lesson the Swedes had in mind...

synos.tran: 给予（尤指抽象事物），传授；告知，透露

remMethod.val: im(向内) ＋ part(部分) → 向内分开 → 赋予， 给予； 参考： import(vt. 进口)

trans.tranOther: to give information, knowledge, wisdom etc to someone
